extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigOverrides

        protected String[] getConfigOverrides(Properties properties,
                          String[] args)
                               throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException,
                                      IOException
        Re-parse our options using the properties from the specified conf file.
        Parameters:
        properties - the command line override properties
        args - command line arguments
        Returns:
        any left-over command line arguments that haven't been parsed. This method sets up and parses only the option file argument, so the return would be everything from the command line args except the --file if provided.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if unable to parse the command line options
        IOException - if unable to read the file

      • initOptions

        protected final org.apache.commons.cli.Options initOptions()

        Parse the arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
        Throws:
        Exception - if the process fails
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if the command line parsing fails

        Copy any of our command-line options that are needed by the configuration Default implementation does nothing.

      • initExtraOptions

        protected void initExtraOptions(org.apache.commons.cli.Options options)
        Extension point for subclasses to add their own extended options. Default implementation does nothing.
        Parameters:
        options - command line options

      • populateExtendedContext

        protected void populateExtendedContext(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine line)
                                throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Extension point for sub-classes to do context setup without having to call super. Allows us to finalize out primary method. Default implementation does nothing.
        Parameters:
        line - command line
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if the parsing of the options fails
